label: StopwordsTokenFilter
description: Removes stop words from a token stream. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Ignore Case
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to ignore case. If true, all words are converted to lower case first. Default is false.

fields.label: Remove Trailing
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to ignore the last search term if it's a stop word. Default is true.

fields.label: Stopwords
fields.tooltip: The list of stopwords. This property and the stopwordsList property cannot both be set.

fields.label: Stopwords List
fields.tooltip: A predefined list of language-specific stopwords to use. This property and the stopwords property cannot both be set. Default is English.
